__e: So, I have a meeting with Professor Lawrence and I'm pretty sure that he wants to bone me.

- Dr. Lawrence has nothing to do with these.
I'm just saying Lawrence hasn't put it down in a very long time, okay?
All due respect, Lawrence, you don't know shit about my father.
And you think you're Lawrence of Arabia, I'm sure.
I certainly saw it. Who is Lawrence of Arabia?
I'll bring Lawrence of Arabia, he doesn't seem too busy at the moment.
Lawrence, it's only a matter of time.
Lawrence is better than all you lot put together, and he's all I've got, alright?
Why did you say Lawrence is a monster?
